page.content:
CROPS AND MACHINERY ON SCORAIG
ALL THE CROFTERS MAKE HAY.SOME PEOPLE GROW SWEDES AND KALE FOR THEIR STOCK. TWO CROFTERS MAKE SILAGE.SOME CROFTERS HAVE AS MUCH AS 20 ACRES OF ARABLE BUT STONIER CROFTS MAY HAVE AS FEW AS 6 ACRES.ALL CROFTS HAVE GARDENS WHERE THEY GROW A GREAT VARIETY OF VEGETABLES--CARROTS,POTATOES,CABBAGES, PARSNIPS,BEETROOT,SPROUTS,TOMATOES,PEA S AND BEANS.MANY GROW FRUIT--APPLES, PEARS,PLUMS,CURRANTS,RASPBERRIES,STRAW BERRIES AND GOOSEBERRIES. ALL CROFTERS HAVE A TRACTOR OR SHARE IN ONE.THIS ESSENTIAL FOR MOVING GOODS FROM THE BOATS TO HOUSES.THERE IS ALSO A DUMPER TRUCK.MOST CROFTERS HAVE IMPLEMENTS--HAYMOWER AND BUCKRACK WHICH THEY OWN PERSONALLY. OTHER IMPLEMENTS ARE PLOUGH,TRAILER AND SPREADER.
